page.title: 15BUTT LANE INTERVIEWS
page.content: { TILCON}is situated on West Avenue Industrial Estate. They get scrap pottery from Twyfords and grind it up to be made into other bathroom furniture like toilets, baths and basins. At{HOTPOINT}they repair domestic electrical equipment. The depot has been open for 23 years. They get the name{HOTPOINT}from America because at first they only made irons and they were the first to invent the{hot point of the iron. The{Ebenezer Gospel Hall}was built for the Welsh miners. Mr Moseley gave us information about it. The front was rebuilt in 1975 ten years ago, and there has been a school room built in 1956. Mr Moseley had lived in Bambury Street since 1939.
